nodes.text: A clone naval officer was stationed on a medical Pelta-class frigate during the events of the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, a Galactic Republic medical convoy, which included the Pelta-class frigate, was attacked near the Ryndellia system by the Separatist Subjugator-class heavy cruiser, the Malevolence, under command of General Grievous. The ship was badly damaged and it's occupants, this clone along with a fellow naval officer and a medical officer, were forced to evacuate using escape pods. The pods were later shot down by the Malevolence.
